mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_access_record ( msg_id, msg_type, from_user_name, to_user_name, create_time, header, req, rsp, access_type, access_key ) VALUES ( #{msgId}, #{msgType}, #{fromUserName}, #{toUserName}, #{createTime}, #{header}, #{req}, #{rsp}, #{accessType}, #{accessKey} )
mapper.select: SELECT msg_id, msg_type, from_user_name, to_user_name, create_time, header, req, rsp, access_type, access_key FROM t_access_record t INNER JOIN ( SELECT from_user_name as user_name, MAX(create_time) AS max_time FROM t_access_record WHERE create_time > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) - 2851200 and length(access_key) > 0 and length(rsp) > 0 GROUP BY from_user_name ) AS sub ON t.from_user_name = sub.user_name AND t.create_time = sub.max_time;
SELECT access_key FROM t_access_record WHERE length(rsp) > 0 AND create_time > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) - 2851200 AND length(access_key) > 0 GROUP BY access_key HAVING count(*) > 1;
